page.title: 05SHOPS IN THE HIGH STREET
page.content: In the Odiham High Street ther are two banks,an estate-agent's office, a new travel agency and several other offices. Two large food stores and a number of others sell perishable items such as bread, fish and confectionery. There is one newsagent who sells daily newspapers and magazines. A chemist's shop and pharmacy combined, dispenses prescriptions. The Doctors' Surgery is on the opposite side of the street. There are two antique shops. There are four dress shops and a children's clothing and toy shop. On the High Street there is a coffee-bar and two restaurants. Also, a stationer's shop which specialises in office stationery There is an interior-designer's shop, a china store and three hair-dressing salons. The Bell Inn has its entrance in the Bury,off the High Street.It has a small number of guest rooms to let.
